DOC.detailed_description: This retrospective/prospective , multi-site observational study , design evaluate clinical outcome complication rate subject previously implant Fibulock™ intramedullary nail . Patients screen eligibility subgroupings . Informed consent obtain meet screen criterion interested participate study . Sites ask enroll subject accord past treatment , Fibulock™ intramedullary nail unstable fibula fracture . The site enroll subject study base inclusion/exclusion criterion . Patient pre-operative , intra-operative post-operative record review retrospectively . Once enrol , subject undergo evaluation fracture outcome complete VAS pain score , SF-12 , Foot Function Index 26 week 52 week post-treatment .
